## createModuleFromProvider variable

Constructs a module component that includes the referenced providers in topological order

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createModuleFromProvider: (aProviders: ReactProvider<any>[]) => import("../type/type.ref").ReactComponent<ReactModuleProps, any>
```
